layer_sequence_get_headpos.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headpos.htm+html.body.p:87-3
layer_sequence_get_headpos: With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current playhead position (the current frame the playhead is on).

layer_sequence_get_headpos.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headpos.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
layer_sequence_get_headpos: The unique ID value of the sequence element to target

layer_sequence_get_headpos.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headpos.htm+html.body.p:111-3
layer_sequence_get_headpos: The above code checks the current playhead position of the sequence element ID stored in the variable "title_sequence", and if it's not set to 0, it is set to this value.
